definition: causing dejection, a dull greyish to yellowish or light olive brown
details:
adjective
- causing dejection
= synonyms: dark
- of a light brownish green color
= synonyms: olive-drab
- lacking brightness or color
= synonyms: somber, sombre, sober
- lacking in liveliness or charm or surprise
= example: lacking in liveliness or charm or surprise
= synonyms: dreary
noun
- a dull greyish to yellowish or light olive brown
= synonyms: olive drab
